articles.author: Midhat Fatimah
articles.title: Obesity surpasses undernourishment among children — UNICEF - DW
articles.description: For the first time, there are more obese children than underweight children around the world — except in sub-Saharan Africa and South Asia.
articles.content:
The number of obese school-aged children has exceeded the number of underweight children globally, according to a new report released by UNICEF.
This is the first time obesity has overtaken undernou… [+2253 chars]
